pages.text: Zenaspis is a Devonian agnathan fish, similar to Cephalaspis, from shallow waters. It is known from fossilized headshields and was quite small, not more than half a meter in most estimates.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
